text: Chloe Thomas is a film and TV director and producer, known for her work on "Hetty Feather", nominated for a BAFTA (Children's Award) in the category of Best Drama, and on "Horrible Histories" nominated for a BAFTA (Children's Award) in the category of Best Factual. ==Career== Chloe Thomas has worked with Bwark Productions to produce the short film Shop Girl Diaries and the television series Angelo's, written by Sharon Horgan, which ran for six episodes. ==Selected filmography== {| class = "wikitable sortable" |- !
